name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chat with Desksense AI Powered by GPT4

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Ultimate AI Assistant with GPT-4 powered responses. Answer any queries, summarize articles, create emails, content & AI images.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Desksense ChatGPT AI app provides Free Chat GPT & GPT-4 access, AI writer for Email, Blogs, Articles, Tweets, Linkedin posts, Facebook Posts, Replies and more. Desksense AI uses OpenAI ChatGPT to summarize Youtube videos & Blog in one-click.

Desksense AI app revolutionizes your online search experience by integrating Open AI ChatGPT alongside your Google search engine. With Desksense you can access instant AI-generated responses, providing valuable insights and information right alongside the search results you're browsing.

With just a CMD+ I OR CTRL+ I Desksense makes it easy for you to access the ChatGPT on any website. Use "Shortcuts" for Advanced users.

👉👉 Save ANY ChatGPT, GPT-4, Claude3 OR Genini Pro response to your Desksense Account in one-click.

🌟Desksense Spotlight powered by ChatGPT | Claude | Gemini Pro:🌟

👉 [New Update] Desksense comes with new Chat GPT models like; GPT-4-o-mini and other LLM's like Claude3 & Gemini Pro version.
👉 [New Update] Desksense comes AI Image Analyzer
👉 Desksense iOS App is now live in App Store.
👉 New AI Summarizer is now live with upload file feature.
👉 AI Writer for ANY content with ChatGPT-4, GPT-4-o-mini, Claude 3 & Gemini Pro option (Emoji, character limit included with a different lanuage model.) 
👉 FREE AI Chatbot integrated with ChatGPT & GPT-4 in web app
👉 Get ChatGpt AI response or replies with 'Tone' and 'Emoji'
👉 Unlimited AI response on Google Search
👉 One-click AI summarizer for Youtube videos
👉 One-click AI summarizer for ANY website
👉 ChatGPT AI Image generator using Dall-E
👉 Save ChatGPT response in your account for later use.
👉 Save your frequently used prompt(s)
👉 List of 100+ preset prompts and option to edit and save in your account.
👉 Easy Access with CMD + I OR CTRL + I on ANY website
👉 Grow your Social Media presence using Desksense AI response in LinkedIn posts, Twitter & Facebook posts.
👉 Write faster and smarter emails on Gmail, Tweets, Linkedin Posts and Facebook posts
👉 Generate online content, video script, hashtags & keywords and topics for blog posts, articles and socials using Desksense AI ChatGPT App.
👉 Share your saved response to social media using our Desksense Web App
👉 Copy to clipboard, Save, Favorite and add tags to ChatGPT responses as Card.
👉 Desksense Chat GPT & GPT 4 Android Mobile App
👉 Auto Dark/light mode
👉 Change the Tone of your response and include emoji when needed.
👉 AI Chatroom Collaboration with your Team
👉 AI Chatbot in Extension
👉 AI Content Generator - AI Email Writer, AI Article Writer using ChatGPT, GPT-4, GPT-4-o-mini, Claude3 and Gemini Pro., AI Code Generator, AI Social Media Post Generator and more...

Are you a busy professional juggling multiple tasks? A student striving for academic excellence? Or someone seeking to optimize their daily routines? Look no further! Desksense is here to revolutionize your digital experience.


Desksense FAQ

1. What is Desksense? 

Desksense is a powerful chrome extension that leverages the ChatGPT API to enhance your productivity. It provides a range of AI applications, including ChatGPT & GPT-4 AI chatbot, summarizers, AI writers, and more, accessible on any website.

2. Is Desksense free to use? 

Yes, Desksense is completely free to download and use. Every free user gets 5000 Word limit for month.

3. Which search engines are supported? 

Desksense supports major search engine like Google.

4. Do I need a ChatGPT/OpenAI account? 

No, you do not require a separate ChatGPT account. Simply sign up for free at Desksense.com to access the extension.

5. Is Desksense accessible in my country? 

Yes, Desksense chrome extension works seamlessly in all countries, ensuring that users worldwide can benefit from its features.


😇 How do I install Desksense in my browser ?

To install Desksense on your browser, you will need to follow these steps:

1) In your browser open the browser's app store or extension store

2) Search for the Desksense in the browser's app store or extension store (or click for : Google Chrome | Edge)

3) Click on the "Add to Browser" or "Install" button to begin the installation process.

4) Follow the prompts to give the extension permission to access certain parts of your browser, if prompted.

5) Once the installation is complete, you will be redirected to our onboarding page

6) That’s it ! you are done :) Please pin the ext. on top bar to get on-time updates.


🌐 Visit our website to learn more on Desksense.com

💫 Troubleshooting

If you have any questions, please feel free to reach us at support@desksense.com

=== VERSION 1.0.13 ====
* NEW FEATURE: AI Writer for ANY content with newest version of GPT models (Emoji, character limit included with a different lanuage model.) 
* NEW FEATURE: AI Image Analyzer that analyses any image and gives you response describing the image.
* File Summarizer: Upload any file & summarize in one-click
* Minor Bug fixes
